content.description: Climb the short hand crack.  Good for beginners to learn hand and foot jamming.
content.protection: Trees anchors at the top with a long top system.
content.location: From the Risque Pinnacle scramble up around the left corner passing the Offwidth climb “Jamming not Required” and continue to scramble to the Left and down around the next corner.  The hand crack will be in front of you on the second wall.

content.description: Climb the Off-width, Jamming is not required but fun to practice.
content.protection: Tree anchors are pretty far back watch out for the poison ivy around the trees.
content.location: On the first wide face to the Left of the Risque Pinnacle there are two large crack lines splitting the face this off-width is the right crack.  Scramble up the boulders to it's base.

content.description: This area includes all the shorter rock to the Left of the Main area of Risque Pinnacle
